description:
Short animation. I hoped for 1 hour BUT clouds rolled in and so I stopped after 40 minutes. I could see a pretty nice surge prom when I was setting up.  The hedgerow prom was pretty active. There is some interesting activity near 2876/2785 with filament movement and nice prom activity. I wish I used my double stack system. I also caught a little flare at 2786 (will appear black with inverted disk).

It takes a while to load since itâ€™s 70mb

I captured 1000 frames every 30 seconds (140 FPS)

AS3 to batch stack. I stacked 75 frames
IMPPG to sharpen and apply tone curves
ImPPG to batch align
Pixinsight
-Crop, linear fit due to changing intensity,  RGB, LHE, Color (see 2nd upload)

Final is 20FPS.
title: Animation from 11_23
